author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Bhikkhu Sujato, 2018. Dedicated to the public domain via Creative Commons Zero (CC0). You are encouraged to copy, reproduce, adapt, alter, or otherwise make use of this translation in any way you wish. Attribution is appreciated but not legally required.

segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 1
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 1

segments.pli: 1. Rūpādivagga
segments.en: 1. Sights, Etc.

segments.pli: Evaṃ me sutaṃ—
segments.en: So I have heard.

segments.pli: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.

segments.pli: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
segments.en: There the Buddha addressed the mendicants,

segments.pli: “bhikkhavo”ti.
segments.en: “Mendicants!”

segments.pli: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
segments.en: “Venerable sir,” they replied.

segments.pli: Bhagavā etadavoca:
segments.en: The Buddha said this:

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthirūpaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single sight that occupies a man’s mind like the sight of a woman.

segments.pli: Itthirūpaṃ, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
segments.en: The sight of a woman occupies a man’s mind.”

segments.pli: Paṭhamaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekasaddampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthisaddo.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single sound that occupies a man’s mind like the sound of a woman.

segments.pli: Itthisaddo, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
segments.en: The sound of a woman occupies a man’s mind.”

segments.pli: Dutiyaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekagandhampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthigandho.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single smell that occupies a man’s mind like the smell of a woman.

segments.pli: Itthigandho, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
segments.en: The smell of a woman occupies a man’s mind.”

segments.pli: Tatiyaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekarasampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthiraso.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single taste that occupies a man’s mind like the taste of a woman.

segments.pli: Itthiraso, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
segments.en: The taste of a woman occupies a man’s mind.”

segments.pli: Catutthaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekaphoṭṭhabbampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthiphoṭṭhabbo.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single touch that occupies a man’s mind like the touch of a woman.

segments.pli: Itthiphoṭṭhabbo, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
segments.en: The touch of a woman occupies a man’s mind.”

segments.pli: Pañcamaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, purisarūpaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single sight that occupies a woman’s mind like the sight of a man.

segments.pli: Purisarūpaṃ, bhikkhave, itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
segments.en: The sight of a man occupies a woman’s mind.”

segments.pli: Chaṭṭhaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekasaddampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, purisasaddo.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single sound that occupies a woman’s mind like the sound of a man.

segments.pli: Purisasaddo, bhikkhave, itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
segments.en: The sound of a man occupies a woman’s mind.”

segments.pli: Sattamaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekagandhampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, purisagandho.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single smell that occupies a woman’s mind like the smell of a man.

segments.pli: Purisagandho, bhikkhave, itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
segments.en: The smell of a man occupies a woman’s mind.”

segments.pli: Aṭṭhamaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekarasampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, purisaraso.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single taste that occupies a woman’s mind like the taste of a man.

segments.pli: Purisaraso, bhikkhave, itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
segments.en: The taste of a man occupies a woman’s mind.”

segments.pli: Navamaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekaphoṭṭhabbampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, purisaphoṭṭhabbo.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single touch that occupies a woman’s mind like the touch of a man.

segments.pli: Purisaphoṭṭhabbo, bhikkhave, itthiyā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
segments.en: The touch of a man occupies a woman’s mind.”

segments.pli: Dasamaṃ.
Rūpādivaggo paṭhamo.
